summary: This is a batch file that gives the player necessary items to craft (smithing, leatherworking, etc)
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a simple batch file. to use just download move the file into your Skyrim directory (NOT THE DATA FILE) then open up your game, activate your console by pressing the tilde key \"~\" and type \"bat ingots\" without the quotes. this should give you:
100 iron ingot
100 steel ingot 
100 corundum ingot
100 orichalcum ingot
100 ebony ingot
100 gold ingot
100 moonstone ingot
100 malachite ingot
100 silver ingot
100 leather (no strips)
100 dragon bones
100 dragon scales
100 Daedra hearts
ENJOY YOUR CRAFTING EXPEIENCE! 
*Please let me know about any problems if they occur and I will fix them and release a new version ASAP!
author: Jace616
